body_html: Do you get deterministic results if you run this on CPU? Results of optimized GPU computations for NN ops are usually a little bit non-deterministic, I think it's a nature of how modern GPUs work, @zheng-xq may have more understanding of this
body_text: Do you get deterministic results if you run this on CPU? Results of optimized GPU computations for NN ops are usually a little bit non-deterministic, I think it's a nature of how modern GPUs work, @zheng-xq may have more understanding of this
